languages.text: {n}К вашему удивлению, вы не видите ни поддоспешник, ни одежду — кажется, тонкий и легкий доспех крепится прямо к бледной, иссеченной венами коже друкари. Вы замечаете две ранки от уколов, окруженные синюшными ореолами — что-то пронзило саму плоть, за счет чего пластина и держалась на месте.{/n}

{n}You are shocked to find no under-armour or clothing — it seems the thin, light armour is attached directly to the Drukhari's pale skin, roped with veins. You notice two pinprick marks surrounded by purplish bruises — something pierced his flesh here, and that is what kept the armour plate in place.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}К вашему удивлению, вы не видите ни поддоспешник, ни одежду — кажется, тонкий и легкий доспех крепится прямо к бледной, иссеченной венами коже друкари. Вы замечаете две ранки от уколов, окруженные синюшными ореолами — что-то пронзило саму плоть, за счет чего пластина и держалась на месте.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You are shocked to find no under-armour or clothing — it seems the thin, light armour is attached directly to the Drukhari's pale skin, roped with veins. You notice two pinprick marks surrounded by purplish bruises — something pierced his flesh here, and that is what kept the armour plate in place.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

You notice two pinprick marks surrounded by purplish bruises — something pierced his flesh here, and that is what kept the armour plate in place.{/n}

You notice two pinprick marks surrounded by purplish bruises — something pierced his flesh here, and that is what kept the armour plate in place.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}You are shocked to find no under-armour or clothing — it seems the thin, light armour is attached directly to the Drukhari's pale skin, roped with veins. You notice two pinprick marks surrounded by purplish bruises — something pierced his flesh here, and that is what kept the armour plate in place.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}你震惊地发现，玛拉斋身上没穿任何衬甲或衣物。看起来，这套轻薄的护甲是直接嵌在他的肉体上的。他苍白的皮肤上血管密布，你注意到了两处针刺的痕迹，周围全都是紫红色的淤伤。有什么东西刺穿了他的身体，而他的护甲板也正是以这种方式固定住的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are shocked to find no under-armour or clothing — it seems the thin, light armour is attached directly to the Drukhari's pale skin, roped with veins. You notice two pinprick marks surrounded by purplish bruises — something pierced his flesh here, and that is what kept the armour plate in place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你震惊地发现，玛拉斋身上没穿任何衬甲或衣物。看起来，这套轻薄的护甲是直接嵌在他的肉体上的。他苍白的皮肤上血管密布，你注意到了两处针刺的痕迹，周围全都是紫红色的淤伤。有什么东西刺穿了他的身体，而他的护甲板也正是以这种方式固定住的。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}中に防具用のインナーや服は着ていない。どうやら、薄く軽い防具が、デュカーリの白い肌に、血管に結び付ける形で直接取り付けられているようだ。紫色のあざに囲まれたピンでの刺し跡が2箇所ある。ここから何かがマラズハイの肉体に突き刺さることで、防具を定位置に留めているのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are shocked to find no under-armour or clothing — it seems the thin, light armour is attached directly to the Drukhari's pale skin, roped with veins. You notice two pinprick marks surrounded by purplish bruises — something pierced his flesh here, and that is what kept the armour plate in place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}中に防具用のインナーや服は着ていない。どうやら、薄く軽い防具が、デュカーリの白い肌に、血管に結び付ける形で直接取り付けられているようだ。紫色のあざに囲まれたピンでの刺し跡が2箇所ある。ここから何かがマラズハイの肉体に突き刺さることで、防具を定位置に留めているのだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Te sorprende descubrir que no lleva ninguna prenda protectora bajo la armadura; las delgadas y ligeras placas de blindaje se fijan directamente a la piel pálida y venosa del drukhari. Adviertes dos pinchazos en una zona amoratada de su carne; parece que lleva la pieza de armadura clavada directamente a ella.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are shocked to find no under-armour or clothing — it seems the thin, light armour is attached directly to the Drukhari's pale skin, roped with veins. You notice two pinprick marks surrounded by purplish bruises — something pierced his flesh here, and that is what kept the armour plate in place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Te sorprende descubrir que no lleva ninguna prenda protectora bajo la armadura; las delgadas y ligeras placas de blindaje se fijan directamente a la piel pálida y venosa del drukhari. Adviertes dos pinchazos en una zona amoratada de su carne; parece que lleva la pieza de armadura clavada directamente a ella.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}À votre grande surprise, il ne porte rien sous sa cuirasse. Les fines plaques métalliques sont rivées à même sa peau blafarde, couturée de veines saillantes. Vous remarquez deux trous d'épingle entourés de lésions violacées, à l'endroit où deux attaches plantées dans sa chair sont censées maintenir l'armure en place.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are shocked to find no under-armour or clothing — it seems the thin, light armour is attached directly to the Drukhari's pale skin, roped with veins. You notice two pinprick marks surrounded by purplish bruises — something pierced his flesh here, and that is what kept the armour plate in place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À votre grande surprise, il ne porte rien sous sa cuirasse. Les fines plaques métalliques sont rivées à même sa peau blafarde, couturée de veines saillantes. Vous remarquez deux trous d'épingle entourés de lésions violacées, à l'endroit où deux attaches plantées dans sa chair sont censées maintenir l'armure en place.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Du bist schockiert, dass er darunter keine Unterbekleidung trägt – es scheint, als sei die dünne, leichte Rüstung direkt mit der blassen, von Adern durchzogenen Haut des Drukhari verbunden. Du erkennst zwei Einstichstellen, umgeben von violetten Flecken – irgendetwas war hier in sein Fleisch eingedrungen und hat die Panzerplatte in Position gehalten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are shocked to find no under-armour or clothing — it seems the thin, light armour is attached directly to the Drukhari's pale skin, roped with veins. You notice two pinprick marks surrounded by purplish bruises — something pierced his flesh here, and that is what kept the armour plate in place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bist schockiert, dass er darunter keine Unterbekleidung trägt – es scheint, als sei die dünne, leichte Rüstung direkt mit der blassen, von Adern durchzogenen Haut des Drukhari verbunden. Du erkennst zwei Einstichstellen, umgeben von violetten Flecken – irgendetwas war hier in sein Fleisch eingedrungen und hat die Panzerplatte in Position gehalten.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Altında ikinci bir zırh ya da bir kıyafet görememek seni şaşırtıyor. Görünüşe göre ince ve hafif zırh, Drukhari'nin solgun derisine doğruca damarlarından bağlanmış. Etrafını mora çalan çürüklerin sardığı iki iğne deliğini fark ediyorsun. Zırh plakasını yerinde tutan bir şey, tam burada etini delip geçmiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are shocked to find no under-armour or clothing — it seems the thin, light armour is attached directly to the Drukhari's pale skin, roped with veins. You notice two pinprick marks surrounded by purplish bruises — something pierced his flesh here, and that is what kept the armour plate in place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Altında ikinci bir zırh ya da bir kıyafet görememek seni şaşırtıyor. Görünüşe göre ince ve hafif zırh, Drukhari'nin solgun derisine doğruca damarlarından bağlanmış. Etrafını mora çalan çürüklerin sardığı iki iğne deliğini fark ediyorsun. Tam burada zırh plakasını yerinde tutan bir şey etini delip geçmiş.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
